attributes.action: Reduce Energy Costs no more Green taxes, investigate using refuse as energy source.
attributes.additional_details:
This country is over subscribed alternative energy costs, wind farms are costing more than they make in energy to run. Use refuse in bespoke powerplants to burn and produce steam for turbines. Renew Nuclear energy for electricity.

The old and infirm cannot afford to heat their homes at current energy costs this has to be reduced. Instead of paying heating allowances, invest in modern energy production and bring the cost of heating bills down.
